snippet: Sports Illustrated is cutting editorial staff just weeks before the start of the Olympics and has asked reporters and editors to volunteer for buyout packages by June 21.
abstract: Sports Illustrated is cutting editorial staff just weeks before the start of the Olympics and has asked reporters and editors to volunteer for buyout packages by June 21.

byline.original: By RICHARD SANDOMIR and CHRISTINE HAUGHNEY

headline.main: Sports Illustrated to Cut Editorial Staff
headline.print_headline: Sports Illustrated Plans Editorial Staff Cuts
